title: Cloud - Migrate VM to Different Region
description: For latency reasons, a client wants to move an Azure VM from the 'East US' region to the 'West US' region.

tasks.description: Use Azure Site Recovery to replicate the VM from the source region to the destination region.
During a planned maintenance window, perform a failover of the VM to the new region.
tasks.expected_outcome: The VM is now running in the 'West US' region.

tasks.description: Update any DNS records to point to the new IP address of the VM and decommission the old VM.
tasks.expected_outcome: The migration is complete, and the old resources are cleaned up.
